alert.note: Alert for Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central York County through 500 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kennebunkport, or 7 miles south of Biddeford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Biddeford, Saco, Kennebunk, Kennebunkport, Wells and Arundel. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 22 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Gooch`s Beach or Goose Rocks Beach, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
